subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] message to Frank S. from Tesla
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I'm going to get even more crazy.  I had an acquaintance about 10 years 
ago who told me he was Nikola Tesla last lifetime.  His knowledge and 
skill with electricity/electronics and his personality traits REALLY bore 
this out. You couldn't behave any more like Nikola Tesla unless you'd 
studied his entire existence in minute detail. I'm sure he had not done 
that.

If that's the case, Nikola Tesla walks the earth now under a new and 
different identity and isn't in "another plane" at all.

Zack
